name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CASAFARI AI - Every Property, Every Detail

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn everything about the property's history and the location around it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock a new level of transparency and insight in your real estate activity with the CASAFARI Chrome Extension. 

This powerful extension lets you access unique information and details about any property listed online, while you are browsing properties, and keep it in sight at all times while you’re navigating on Chrome.


A SMOOTHER BROWSING EXPERIENCE
The CASAFARI Chrome Extension can remain open on the side of your browser window, even as you continue browsing other websites not related to real estate. This means you won't need to switch between windows and tabs, allowing for a seamless and uninterrupted browsing experience.

It’s like you could “augment” any listing page with more information on the right side of your screen, in one click. 


SEE ALL PROPERTY SOURCES
Instantly find out “where else” each property is listed. The extension leverages CASAFARI's unique technology, which aggregates data from thousands of platforms and agency websites, and presents you with a complete overview of a property's online presence. No more switching between tabs— get all the information you need in one place.


TRACK PROPERTY HISTORY
Stay informed with detailed property histories. CASAFARI extension tracks price changes and listing updates, providing a timeline of when and where each property was listed. This timeline helps you understand market trends and how the listing price evolved, giving you a competitive edge.


RELIABLE PRICE VALUATION
Be more confident with accurate price valuations, based on comparable properties on-sale AND sold. You will also find statistics on average prices, price per square meter, and average time on the market for these comparable properties. These insights enable you to gauge a property's true value and make smarter decisions based on real data. 


YOUR ULTIMATE REAL ESTATE COMPANION
The CASAFARI Extension is your ultimate companion when browsing properties online. You will always be equipped with the best knowledge for every property. Whether you want to get new mandates, accelerate a deal, find a property for one of your buyers, or simply explore - CASAFARI extension delivers the transparency and data you need to navigate the real estate market with confidence and ease, and remain an expert on your market. 


Install it today and transform your real estate game.
